name: Light (itch) (Álvaro Delgado)
description:
Light is a platform game in 2D which uses dynamic shadows and different shaders for creating different mechanics focused on the illumination.

The character has a flashlight and a wave machine. Using these objects, the game gives to the player new scene illumination mechanics.

The player can move the character around the scene in any direction, walking or running. The character can jump, with a single jump and a predetermined distance, bending and sliding down the walls. In addition, within the movement, he can climb ladders and clinging to the edges of the corners.

The character can interact with different elements of the scene using the action button.

The art of the game is graphics that simulate silhouettes. These silhouettes appear in shades of gray. The elements with which the player can interact appear in blue.

Presented as a bachelor’s final project. Made with Unity and C#.
